title: Nature in Primary School
banerDescription: Gain qualifications to teach nature in primary school, developing your competencies in natural sciences and didactics.
description:
• Teachers wishing to obtain qualifications to teach nature in primary school
  • Individuals interested in teaching natural science subjects at the primary school level
  • Teachers wanting to expand their competencies in biology, chemistry, physics, and geography
description2: The aim of the postgraduate studies in Nature in Primary School is to prepare teachers to conduct nature classes at the primary education level. The study program aims to develop didactic and methodological competencies in teaching nature, enabling effective knowledge transfer and developing students' interests in the field of natural sciences.
description3: The studies allow for deepening theoretical knowledge in the fields of biology, chemistry, geography, and physics, which will enable a comprehensive approach to teaching nature in primary school. Participants will understand the processes occurring in nature and their impact on the natural environment and human life, including issues related to environmental protection and sustainable development.
description4: The study program emphasizes shaping pro-ecological attitudes among students by introducing practical issues related to environmental protection and sustainable use of natural resources. Participants will gain skills in conducting practical classes that engage students in nature research and experiments.

topics.title: Structure and Life Functions of Animals
Structure and Life Functions of Plants

faculty: Classes are conducted by experienced practitioners in the field of natural sciences and didactics of natural science subjects.
practices:
• The internship includes 60 hours and allows gaining experience in teaching nature in primary school.
  • Internships can be carried out in primary schools under the supervision of experienced teachers.
evaluation: Assessment of learning outcomes is based on activity during classes, completion of individual modules, implementation of internships, and preparation of a diploma thesis.
jobOpportunities:
Graduates of the program will be prepared to work as:

  • Nature teachers in primary schools
  • Specialists in natural science education
  • Consultants in teaching natural science subjects
  • Animators of nature and ecological activities
  • Employees of educational institutions promoting ecological education
invite: Gain the qualifications and skills necessary to teach nature in primary school and inspire students to discover the fascinating world of natural sciences.
